Name: "Everyday Life in the Forbidden Fortress"
Desc: A simple wooden table found in the Fortress of Meropide. This wooden table with a basic structure is made with a combination of recycled materials from the production zone and Linden Wood. Perhaps sitting around an "ordinary" table like this and enjoying an "ordinary" Welfare Meal is the most "ordinary" daily life for the ordinary criminals living in the Fortress of Meropide.
